home.title: Ngwọta Ọrụ Ugbo Nwere Ọgụgụ Isi maka Africa na Karịa
home.subtitle: Ọgụgụ isi ọrụ ugbo nke AI na-eme ka ọ dịkwuo mma na uru nke ugbo gị

cropPlanner.title: Atụmatụ Ihe Ọkụkụ Nwere Ọgụgụ Isi
cropPlanner.description: Nweta ndụmọdụ nke AI na-enye maka ihe ọkụkụ kacha mma ị ga-akụ dabere na ebe ị nọ, ala na ihu igwe

soilAdvisor.title: Nyocha Ahụike Ala
soilAdvisor.description: Nyochaa ọnọdụ ala gị ma nweta ndụmọdụ ahaziri onwe gị maka njikwa nri

waterOptimizer.title: Njikwa Mmiri
waterOptimizer.description: Mee ka ojiji mmiri dịkwuo mma site n'usoro nhazi ịgba mmiri nwere ọgụgụ isi na atụmatụ nchekwa

marketEstimator.title: Ọgụgụ Isi Ahịa
marketEstimator.description: Nweta atụmatụ ọnụ ahịa ahịa n'oge na atụmatụ ire ere kacha mma maka ihe ọkụkụ gị
